 /* Disable tracking if the opt-out cookie exists. */
 if ( __gaTrackerIsOptedOut() ) {

   <style id="siteorigin-panels-layouts-head" media="all" type="text/css">
    /* Layout 9 */ #pgc-9-0-0 , #pgc-9-1-0 { width:100%;width:calc(100% - ( 0 * 30px ) ) } #pl-9 #panel-9-0-0-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-1-0-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-2-0-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-2-1-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-2-2-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-3-0-0 , #pl-9 #panel-9-4-0-0 {  } #pg-9-0 , #pg-9-1 , #pg-9-2 , #pl-9 .so-panel:last-child { margin-bottom:0px } #pgc-9-2-0 , #pgc-9-2-1 , #pgc-9-2-2 { width:33.3333%;width:calc(33.3333% - ( 0.66666666666667 * 30px ) ) } #pgc-9-3-0 , #pgc-9-4-0 { width:100%;width:calc(100% - ( 0 * 0% ) ) } #pg-9-3 , #pg-9-4 { margin-bottom:0% } #pl-9 .so-panel { margin-bottom:30px } #pg-9-0.panel-no-style, #pg-9-0.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-1.panel-no-style, #pg-9-1.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-2.panel-no-style, #pg-9-2.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-3.panel-no-style, #pg-9-3.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-4.panel-no-style, #pg-9-4.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style { -webkit-align-items:flex-start;align-items:flex-start } #pg-9-2> .panel-row-style { padding:0px 20px 20px 20px } #pg-9-3> .panel-row-style { padding:0px 20px 0px 20px } #pg-9-4> .panel-row-style { padding:0% 0% 0% 0% } @media (max-width:780px){ #pg-9-0.panel-no-style, #pg-9-0.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-1.panel-no-style, #pg-9-1.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-2.panel-no-style, #pg-9-2.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-3.panel-no-style, #pg-9-3.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-9-4.panel-no-style, #pg-9-4.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style { -webkit-flex-direction:column;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column } #pg-9-0 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-1 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-2 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-3 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-4 .panel-grid-cell { margin-right:0 } #pg-9-0 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-1 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-2 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-3 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-9-4 .panel-grid-cell { width:100% } #pgc-9-2-0 , #pgc-9-2-1 { margin-bottom:30px } #pl-9 .panel-grid-cell { padding:0 } #pl-9 .panel-grid .panel-grid-cell-empty { display:none } #pl-9 .panel-grid .panel-grid-cell-mobile-last { margin-bottom:0px } #pg-9-2> .panel-row-style { padding:0px 0px 0px 0px } #pg-9-4> .panel-row-style { padding:0% 0% 0% 0% }  }
   </style>
   <style type="text/css">
    .saboxplugin-wrap {margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; padding: 0px 0px }.saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-authorname {font-size:18px; line-height:25px;}.saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-desc p, .saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-desc {font-size:14px !important; line-height:21px !important;}.saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-web {font-size:14px;}.saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-socials .saboxplugin-icon-color.fa:before {font-size:14px;}.saboxplugin-wrap .saboxplugin-socials .saboxplugin-icon-color.fa {width:28px; height:28px; line-height:28px; }
   </style>
   <style type="text/css">
    .row { width: 1280px; }
   </style>
   <style type="text/css">
    #top-head {
 padding: 0px  0px 0px 0px;
 }

 padding: 0 0px;
 }

 margin: 15px 0px 0px 20px;

 padding: 0px;
 }

 height: 0px;

 }

 height: 0px;
 margin: 5px 0;
 }

 background: none !important;
 padding-top: 0px;
 }

 text-align: center;
 position: fixed;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 1000;
 width: 0%;

 height: 0px;

 }

 color: #999967;
 text-transform: capitalize;
 }

 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0px;

 }

 }

 }

 }

 }

 }

 }

     Sir Toby's | Prague's Favourite Hostel!

              <img alt="sir-tobys-hostel-prague-private-room-1920×730" class="soliloquy-image soliloquy-image-4" id="soliloquy-image-5485" src="https://www.sirtobys.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/sir-tobys-hostel-prague-private-room-1920x730.jpg"/>
             </a>
             <div class="soliloquy-caption">
              <div class="soliloquy-caption-inside">
               <p style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 24px;">
                It pays to book direct!
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <noscript>
           <style type="text/css">
            #soliloquy-container-5116{opacity:1}
           </style>
          </noscript>
          <center>

      </div>
      <div class="panel-grid panel-has-style" id="pg-9-2">
       <div class="panel-row-style panel-row-style-for-9-2">
        <div class="panel-grid-cell" id="pgc-9-2-0">
         <div class="so-panel widget_black-studio-tinymce widget_black_studio_tinymce panel-first-child panel-last-child widgetopts-SO" data-index="2" id="panel-9-2-0-0">
          <div class="textwidget">
           <h3 style="text-align: center;">
            <a href="https://www.sirtobys.com/rooms-prices/private-rooms/" style="color: #999967;">
             Private Rooms
            </a>
           </h3>
           <p>
            <img alt="sir tobys hostel prague double room" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-5492" height="506" src="https://www.sirtobys.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/sir-tobys-hostel-prague-double-room-760x506.jpg" width="760"/>
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center; font-size: 16px;">
            From €36/980 Kc /night
           </p>
           <p style="font-size: 16px;">
            Are you a peace-and-quiet-seeker? Romantic-holiday-taker? Intrepid-family-traveller? Never fear, stretch out in one of our hostel's Private Rooms.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center;">
            <span class="mb-center maxbutton-1-center">
             <span class="maxbutton-1-container mb-container">
              <a class="maxbutton-1 maxbutton maxbutton-check-availability" href="https://book.maxbooking.com/index.php?mod=Step1&amp;id=227" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank">
               <span class="mb-text">
                Check Availability
               </span>
              </a>
             </span>
            </span>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="panel-grid-cell" id="pgc-9-2-1">
         <div class="so-panel widget_black-studio-tinymce widget_black_studio_tinymce panel-first-child panel-last-child widgetopts-SO" data-index="3" id="panel-9-2-1-0">
          <div class="textwidget">
           <h3 style="text-align: center;">
            <a href="https://www.sirtobys.com/rooms-prices/shared-rooms/" style="color: #999967;">
             Shared Rooms
            </a>
           </h3>
           <p>
            <img alt="sir tobys hostel prague dorm" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-5493" height="506" src="https://www.sirtobys.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/sir-tobys-hostel-prague-dorm-760x506.jpg" width="760"/>
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center; font-size:16px">
            From €11/300 Kc /Night
           </p>
           <p style="font-size:16px">
            Dare to be a bohemian rockstar? The life of the party? The never-ending-friend-maker? Socialize in style in one of our hostel's Shared Rooms.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center;">
            <span class="mb-center maxbutton-1-center">
             <span class="maxbutton-1-container mb-container">
              <a class="maxbutton-1 maxbutton maxbutton-check-availability" href="https://book.maxbooking.com/index.php?mod=Step1&amp;id=227" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank">
               <span class="mb-text">
                Check Availability
               </span>
              </a>
             </span>
            </span>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="panel-grid-cell" id="pgc-9-2-2">
         <div class="so-panel widget_black-studio-tinymce widget_black_studio_tinymce panel-first-child panel-last-child widgetopts-SO" data-index="4" id="panel-9-2-2-0">
          <div class="textwidget">
           <h3 style="text-align: center;">
            <a href="https://www.sirtobys.com/rooms-prices/direct-bookings/" style="color: #999967;">
             Why Book Direct?
            </a>
           </h3>
           <p>
            <img alt="sir tobys hostel prague summer garden" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-5494" height="506" src="https://www.sirtobys.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/sir-tobys-hostel-prague-summer-garden-760x506.jpg" width="760"/>
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center; font-size:16px">
            It pays to book direct.
           </p>
           <p style="font-size:16px">
            Best price guaranteed. Free small beer in our Sir Toby´s pub. Book now, pay later. Last but not least, you will be supporting the local business.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: center;">
            <a class="maxbutton-23 maxbutton maxbutton-read-more-link-to-direct-bookings" href="https://www.sirtobys.com/rooms-prices/direct-bookings/">
             <span class="mb-text">
              Read More
             </span>
            </a>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="panel-grid panel-has-style" id="pg-9-3">
       <div class="panel-row-style panel-row-style-for-9-3">
        <div class="panel-grid-cell" id="pgc-9-3-0">
         <div class="so-panel widget_siteorigin-panels-builder panel-first-child panel-last-child widgetopts-SO" data-index="5" id="panel-9-3-0-0">
          <div class="panel-layout" id="pl-w5b562160af991">
           <div class="panel-grid panel-has-style" id="pg-w5b562160af991-0">
            <div class="panel-row-style panel-row-style-for-w5b562160af991-0">
             <div class="panel-grid-cell" id="pgc-w5b562160af991-0-0">
              <div class="so-panel widget_black-studio-tinymce widget_black_studio_tinymce panel-first-child panel-last-child widgetopts-SO" data-index="0" id="panel-w5b562160af991-0-0-0">

              </p>

          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-1128" id="menu-item-1128">
           <a href="http://www.bohemianhostels.com/who-we-are/join-the-team/" target="_blank">
            Join the Team
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-2778" id="menu-item-2778">
           <a href="http://bohemianhostels.com/who-we-are/mystery-shopping/" target="_blank">
            Mystery Shopping
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-1707" id="menu-item-1707">
           <a href="http://bohemianhostels.com/our-friends/" target="_blank">
            Useful Links
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-626" id="menu-item-626">
           <a href="https://www.sirtobys.com/sitemap/">
            Sitemap
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
        <div class="six columns copy">
         © 2018
         <a href="https://www.sirtobys.com/">
          <strong>
           Sir Toby's
          </strong>
         </a>
         -
         <a href="https://bohemianhostels.com/privacy-policy/" style="color:#999967;" target="_blank">
          Privacy Policy
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

( 0.66666666666667 * 30px ) ) } #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-0-0-0 , #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-0-1-0 , #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-0-2-0 , #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-1-0-0 , #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-1-1-0 , #pl-w5b562160af991 #panel-w5b562160af991-1-2-0 {  } #pg-w5b562160af991-0 , #pg-w5b562160af991-1 , #pl-w5b562160af991 .so-panel:last-child { margin-bottom:0px } #pl-w5b562160af991 .so-panel { margin-bottom:30px } #pg-w5b562160af991-0> .panel-row-style , #pg-w5b562160af991-1> .panel-row-style { padding:0px 0px 20px 0px } #pg-w5b562160af991-0.panel-no-style, #pg-w5b562160af991-0.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-w5b562160af991-1.panel-no-style, #pg-w5b562160af991-1.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style { -webkit-align-items:flex-start;align-items:flex-start } @media (max-width:780px){ #pg-w5b562160af991-0.panel-no-style, #pg-w5b562160af991-0.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style , #pg-w5b562160af991-1.panel-no-style, #pg-w5b562160af991-1.panel-has-style > .panel-row-style { -webkit-flex-direction:column;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column } #pg-w5b562160af991-0 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-w5b562160af991-1 .panel-grid-cell { margin-right:0 } #pg-w5b562160af991-0 .panel-grid-cell , #pg-w5b562160af991-1 .panel-grid-cell { width:100% } #pgc-w5b562160af991-0-0 , #pgc-w5b562160af991-0-1 , #pgc-w5b562160af991-1-0 , #pgc-w5b562160af991-1-1 { margin-bottom:30px } #pl-w5b562160af991 .panel-grid-cell { padding:0 } #pl-w5b562160af991 .panel-grid .panel-grid-cell-empty { display:none } #pl-w5b562160af991 .panel-grid .panel-grid-cell-mobile-last { margin-bottom:0px } #pg-w5b562160af991-0> .panel-row-style , #pg-w5b562160af991-1> .panel-row-style { padding:0px 0px 0px 0px }  } /* Layout w5b1e823ac5b9c */ #pgc-w5b1e823ac5b9c-0-0 , #pgc-w5b1e823ac5b9c-0-1 { width:50%;width:calc(50% -  slideshowSpeed:3000,
 animation:"fade",
 controlNav:false,
 directionNav:true,
 pauseOnHover:true,
 direction:"horizontal",
 reverse:false,

 nextText:"&gt;",

 slideshow:true
 });
 };

 var slider = !window.jQuery ? window.setTimeout(timer_metaslider_5156, 100) : !jQuery.isReady ? window.setTimeout(timer_metaslider_5156, 1) : metaslider_5156(window.jQuery);
 };

   <script type="text/javascript">
    if ( typeof soliloquy_slider === 'undefined' || false === soliloquy_slider ) {soliloquy_slider = {};}jQuery('#soliloquy-container-5116').css('height', Math.round(jQuery('#soliloquy-container-5116').width()/(1920/730)));jQuery(window).load(function(){var $ = jQuery;var soliloquy_container_5116 = $('#soliloquy-container-5116'),soliloquy_5116 = $('#soliloquy-5116');soliloquy_slider['5116'] = soliloquy_5116.soliloquy({slideSelector: '.soliloquy-item',speed: 400,pause: 5000,auto: 1,useCSS: 0,keyboard: true,adaptiveHeight: 1,adaptiveHeightSpeed: 400,infiniteLoop: 1,mode: 'fade',pager: 1,controls: 1,nextText: '',prevText: '',startText: '',stopText: '',onSliderLoad: function(currentIndex){soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-active-slide').removeClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','true');soliloquy_container_5116.css({'height':'auto','background-image':'none'});if ( soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-slider li').length > 1 ) {soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-controls').fadeTo(300, 1);}soliloquy_5116.find('.soliloquy-item:not(.soliloquy-clone):eq(' + currentIndex + ')').addClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','false');soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-clone').find('*').removeAttr('id');soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction').attr('aria-label','carousel buttons').attr('aria-controls', 'soliloquy-container-5116');soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction a.soliloquy-prev').attr('aria-label','previous');soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction a.soliloquy-next').attr('aria-label','next');},onSlideBefore: function(element, oldIndex, newIndex){soliloquy_container_5116.find('.soliloquy-active-slide').removeClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','true');$(element).addClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','false');},onSlideAfter: function(element, oldIndex, newIndex){},});});
   </script>
